issue.title: Add switch for writing Parquet 1.0 compatible logical types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-221](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-221). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the logical types for integer assume that the reader supports Parquet 2.0, we need to add a switch so that a schema is produced that can be read with a Parquet 1.0 compatible reader.
